" Did you know that you can download lessons for offline use? For this update, we made downloads faster! We also made it easier to delete downloaded lessons, so you can save storage space on your device.

Other update highlights:
• Makes it easier to find your download library.
• Simplifies language purchases.
• Improves alert messages to make them more clear.
• Now compatible with iOS 9. "

" Did you know that you can download lessons for offline use? For this update, we made downloads faster! We also made it easier to delete downloaded lessons, so you can save storage space on your device.

Other update highlights:

• Simplifies language purchases.
• Improves alert messages to make them more clear.
• Now compatible with iOS 9. "

What’s new for iOS 9 and above:
• Tutorial for first-time users
• Updated look and feel for an even more engaging learning experience
• Redesigned course player for smoother interaction
Users of iPhone 4S, iPad2, and earlier models of these devices should not upgrade to this version, as this version is not optimized for these devices.

We've added new features to support your language learning!
Stories: Listen, read, and record yourself reading while receiving real-time feedback from our TruAccent™ technology.
Audio Companion: Learn on the go, and reinforce what you've studied.
Phrasebook: Learn and practice practical phrases geared toward travel, and other real-world scenarios.

New in version 4.2:
• Learners can use their company’s single sign-on system to access the application.
• Offline mode is supported for Phrasebook content
• Users can provide ratings and feedback from within the app

We've added a brand new Watch app so you can take your learning wherever you go.
Our new app widget lets you jump into your learning right where you left off.
We've added Touch ID so you can log in with the touch of a finger.

We heard you. We've made it more affordable for you to learn languages with Rosetta Stone.
• Get unlimited access to a language for a low monthly subscription.
• Choose the subscription duration that works best for you.
• Learn on any supported device—on and offline.

• Take advantage of a free trial when selecting a 12 month subscription.
• Want to practice what you've learned in a conversation? We are now supporting our Milestone activity on iOS.
• Have questions about our product or our subscription offerings? Check out our new Frequently Asked Questions section under Settings to find answers to your questions.
• And we've included some performance enhancements to make your experience in our app better.

For the first time, we’re offering every one of our languages under one subscription. Flip between languages as often as you’d like and enjoy the freedom to get seriously curious. To access, simply select Unlimited Languages when you subscribe.

Real people, not robots
Linguists craft our lessons. Coaches bring them to life. 

NEW | Live Lectures: New coaches, topics and times every week. Offered in all languages; Free to all users. 

NEW | Coaching On-Demand: Take conversation practice on-location to Mexico with interactive videos you can watch anytime, anywhere. Offered in our most popular languages; Free to all users.
